items.title: Is Notre Dame Football about to lose another assistant coach?
items.summary: With Notre Dame’s football season over following the college football playoff snub and the decision to play in any bowl games, the focus has turned towards roster management and staff retention. The former is something that still needs time and other developments, but the latter is definitely underway. Notre Dame just lost linebackers coach, Max […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame’s playoff snub was ABSOLUTE CINEMA for the SEC and ESPN
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan opened up the pod bunker to send a special statement out about Notre Dame Football. We will have to dispense with the show notes this week. This was a massive conversation between friends about : And plenty more weaved in and out of the show. Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Recruiting: 4-Star Ohio Cornerback Ace Alston Commits to the Irish
items.summary: People sure do have a lot to say about the Notre Dame Fighting irish right now… but they aren’t saying Marcus Freeman and his staff AREN’T recruiting well. On Tuesday, 4-Star cornerback Ace Alston gave his public commitment to Notre Dame and its 2027 recruiting class. The 5’11” 175 pound defensive back from Anderson High […]

items.title: Notre Dame running back Jeremiyah Love named a Heisman finalist
items.summary: Notre Dame running back, Jeremiyah Love, is the best and most outstanding player in the country. No one is going to convince me otherwise — but there is a certain trophy that he qualifies for that could turn his status to all-time college football legend. The Heisman Trophy. Jeremiyah Love Named Heisman Finalist   SOUTH BEND, […]
